selected_quotes: Single application of topical ivermectin for head #lice had efficacy of 94.9% on day 2 and 73.8% on day 15.
NEJM publishes new RCT of head lice treatments Looks like my PIGPEN trial is consigned to history
Ivermectina tópica, medicamento útil en el tretamiento de la infestacion por piojos de la cabeza,
Poux poux pidoux ! Ivermectine en lotion, un traitement court et efficace de la pédiculose. Enfin ! #NEJM

citation.abstract: The emergence of resistance to treatment complicates the public health problem of head-louse infestations and drives the need for continuing development of new treatments. There are limited data on the activity of ivermectin as a topical lousicide.
citation.title: Topical 0.5% ivermectin lotion for treatment of head lice.

news.title: Ivermectin hair lotion found effective against lice
news.summary: NEW YORK (Reuters Health) - A single 10-minute hair application of a drug used in oral form since the 1980s to control river blindness and other parasitic diseases eliminated head lice in nearly three of four children in a new study.

news.title: Finally - A New Head Lice Treatment That Really Works
news.summary: No one wants to talk about head lice. Even though, after the common cold, head lice is the most common childhood affliction. For those under 12, head lice is now more common than all other communicable diseases put together. Yet there's still a good deal o

facebook.title: Topical 0.5% Ivermectin Lotion for Treatment of Head Lice — NEJM
facebook.summary:
「アタマジラミの治療に、0.5％イベルメクチンローション単回外用が有効だった」
アタマジラミの治療で、0.5％イベルメクチン外用が有効かどうか調べるために、RCTをおこなった。6ヶ月以上の患者で、0.5％イベルメクチンローション単回外用群と対照群を比較。その結果、イベルメクチン群のシラミ消失率は、対照群より高かった。治療2日目で95%vs31%、8日目で85%vs21%、15日目で74%vs18%という結果だった。有害事象は両群で差はなかった。製薬会社がスポンサー。
NEJM 2012; 367:1687-

wikipedia.title: Ivermectin
wikipedia.summary: It is on the World Health Organization's List of Essential Medicines, a list of the most important medication needed in a basic health system.
